plot outline: Anna claims to have seen a tiger in village.But the villagers take it as a hoax.As the elections are near the Sarpanch doesn't want to take risk and calls forest officer.But he is in vain to find the Tiger.Finally villagers come to a decision which is against the forest officer.
title: Wagherya
akas: The Tale of a Tiger (India, English title)
plot: Anna claims to have seen a tiger in village.But the villagers take it as a hoax.As the elections are near the Sarpanch doesn't want to take risk and calls forest officer.But he is in vain to find the Tiger.Finally villagers come to a decision which is against the forest officer.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
